毊字的基本解释

毊
xiāo
乐器名，即大磬。

毊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］
［《廣韻》許嬌切，平宵，曉。］
［《廣韻》巨嬌切，平宵，羣。］
古乐器名。即大磬。

毊字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【殳字部】　毊； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页588第17
【廣韻】許嬌切【集韻】【正韻】虛驕切，?音囂。大磬也。【爾雅·釋樂】大磬謂之毊。【郭註】毊，形似犂錧，以玉石爲之。孫炎云：毊，喬也。喬，高也。謂其聲高也。李巡云：大磬聲淸燥，故曰毊。毊，燥也。《字林》云：錧，田器也。自江而南呼犂刃爲錧。此毊形似之，但大爾。

毊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
毊字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
毊
xiāo
The name of the instrument is the big chime.
毊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xiāo]
["Guangyun" Xu Jiaoqie, Ping Xiao, Xiao. ]
["Guang Yun" Ju Jiao cut, flat night, group. ]
Ancient musical instrument name. That is, the big chime.
毊
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of 殳字]　毊; Kangxi strokes: 23; Page number: page 588 17
[Guang Yun] Xu Jiaoqie [Ji Yun] [Positive Rhyme] arrogant and arrogant, sound arrogant. The big chime is also. 【Erya·Shile】Daqing is called 毊. [Guo's Note] 毊, shaped like a plow, made of jade. Sun Yanyun: 毊, Qiao Ye. Joe, Gao Ye. Said its voice is also high. Li Xunyun: The sound of the big chime is dry, so it is called 毊.毊, dry too. "Zi Lin" says: 錧, Tian Qi also. From the river to the south, the plough blade is called the chariot. This 毊 looks similar, but big.
